alert_details.kibana.alert.rule.name: Suspicious CertUtil Commands
alert_details.kibana.alert.reason: process event with process certutil.exe, parent process python.exe, by VELOX on Neeraj-Sharma.velox.co.in created medium alert Suspicious CertUtil Commands.
alert_details.kibana.alert.rule.description: Identifies suspicious commands being used with certutil.exe. CertUtil is a native Windows component which is part of Certificate Services. CertUtil is often abused by attackers to live off the land for stealthier command and control or data exfiltration.
